message: I think this is a fair split, considering I'm taking the risk of making the first offer.  Let's get this done!
I'm willing to take a smaller share this round, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of!
I'm still willing to negotiate. I think this offer is more fair, given the changing value of the money. What do you think?
It's time to meet in the middle. Let's split it 50/50 and be done with it!
